fix: correct Vercel routing to serve static assets properly

The previous rewrites configuration was catching ALL routes including
static assets (CSS, JS files) and serving index.html for them, causing
MIME type errors.

Changed from ''rewrites'' to ''routes'' with explicit handling:
1. Static assets (/static/*) served directly
2. Common files (manifest, favicon, robots.txt) served directly
3. File extensions (.css, .js, .png, etc.) served directly
4. All other routes fall through to index.html for React Router

This fixes the production deployment MIME type errors.
